plot: Uday, a young photojournalist on assignment in the jungles of the Sundarbans, rescues a white tiger cub ensnared in a poachers trap and brings the cub to a small settlement he is based in...
title: ROAR: Tigers of the Sundarbans
plot_es: Uday, a young photojournalist on assignment in the jungles of the Sundarbans, rescues a white tiger cub ensnared in a poachers trap and brings the cub to a small settlement he is based in...
plot_en: Uday, a young photojournalist on assignment in the jungles of the Sundarbans, rescues a white tiger cub ensnared in a poachers trap and brings the cub to a small settlement he is based in...
